attributes.action: Make it illegal to ride a bike on the road when there are cycle tracks parallel
attributes.additional_details: Everyday occurance, an example is a man hit in Nottingham, cycling on a road which had blind inner corners and also solid white lines... drivers constantly struggle to overtake as not enough room is left. There is a cycle track runnin parallel with the road, it should be used! This happens in a lot of places around the country
attributes.background: Cyclists are hit when there are perfectly good cycle tracks next to roads. When the cycle track is available it should be a legal requirement to use it, not to ride on the road at that point. The cycle track is only there on roads which are dangerous without it, this is a danger for bikes and cars!
